nodes.text: The Corellian Engineering Corporation Space Dock was a space dock model used at the Tallaani Shipyards.

The Tallaani Shipyards had hundreds of dry docks servicing warships and freighters.
Most of the space docks were over 200 years old by the time of the Galactic Civil War and routinely underwent updates and ravamping procedures to keep them up-to-date with technological and security developments.
